LanguageData.OE_Biophormids_Psybolt.label: psybolt
LanguageData.OE_Biophormids_Psybolt.description: Swarmella channels her psychic abilities, unleashing up to 5 Psybolts at her enemies.
LanguageData.OE_Biophormids_PsyStun.label: psy stun
LanguageData.OE_Biophormids_PsyStun.description: Momentarily disrupt motor function in the target's brain, preventing any movement.
